name: Breaking Horizon
description:
You are stuck in a time loop as the mechanic of the deep space research vessel the Dreamcatcher, where you must fix your crewmate's problems, your ship, and figure out how to end the loop to escape.

Features

- over 20,000 words (although you won't read nearly that many)

- 7 characters and minigames

- 3 (technically 4) possible endings

Controls:

WASD - move around

E - interact

W/S - switch dialogue options

Escape - pause / exit game
